title: Banjiuibimil-ilgi season3
synopsis: The lively and cheerful growth diary of Pan Ji and his friends! Even if she irritates her mother, even if her grades are not satisfactory, she can forget the super optimistic girl Pan Ji! Although the academic performance is not ideal, as long as you can play with your close friends Kinxin and Xiangxiang, you can be very happy Pan Ji. With relatives, friends, and loving family members, Pan Ji’s every day is super HAPPY! Although the dream is to become a cartoonist, Pan Ji’s dream will change rapidly according to the different moods of each day. The cute and lively story of Pan Ji and his friends will unfold slowly in the beautiful and sweet strawberry town. What will they do to entertain us today? This is the secret! dense! " (translated from iqiyi)
